tool_description: API for Surebets in sports betting
name: SureBets
title: SureBets

api_list.name: Get Bookmakers
api_list.description: Get a list of all supported bookmakers
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://surebets.p.rapidapi.com/bookmakers"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "surebets.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://surebets.p.rapidapi.com/bookmakers"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "surebets.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: List

optional_parameters.name: bookmakers
optional_parameters.description: List of bookie_slugs separated by a comma
